editor.title: CROSSHAIR EDITOR
editor.subtitle: Advanced Crosshair Editor
editor.description: Our professional-grade crosshair editor is currently under development. Soon you'll be able to create, customize, and perfect your crosshair with precision tools and real-time preview.

features.title: Upcoming Features
features.1: Real-time visual editor with live preview
features.3: Save and share your custom configurations

step1.title: Step 1: Browse & Select
step1.desc: Navigate to the Crosshairs page and browse through our collection of professional player configurations. Use filters and search to find your preferred style.

step2.title: Step 2: Copy the Code
step2.desc: Click the "COPY" button on any crosshair card. The configuration code will be automatically copied to your clipboard.

step3.title: Step 3: Open VALORANT Settings
step3.desc: Launch VALORANT and press ESC to open the menu. Navigate to Settings â†’ Crosshair.

step4.title: Step 4: Import Profile
step4.desc: Click on "Crosshair Profile" and select "Import Profile". Paste the code (Ctrl+V) and press Import.

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.1: Save multiple crosshair profiles for different agents
tips.2: Adjust the color if it doesn't contrast well with your game
tips.3: Test crosshairs in the Practice Range before competitive play
tips.4: Remember: the best crosshair is one you're comfortable with

toast.copyWithTip: Code copied! Now paste it in VALORANT settings.
